title: Gesture Utilization Strategies in Collaborative Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic design processes and ability to create simple visual representations
context.additional_context: Emphasizes real-time collaborative activities using smartphone video recording, including project-based team formation and shared presentation sessions

learning_goals: Learners distinguish the complementary roles of gestures and sketching techniques in collaborative design processes.
Learners use gestures to immediately visualize and communicate design ideas to peers while collecting feedback.
Learners apply evaluation criteria to assess collaboration levels through gesture analysis in team-based design projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
